XIII.ii.5.A.1.d
.
When to Furnish Certification of the Disability Rating of Record
On request, furnish a certification of the disability rating of record, even if it is a temporary rating.
If the 100-percent evaluation is assigned under
38 CFR 4.28
,
38 CFR 4.29
, or
38 CFR 4.30
of the rating schedule
include a statement that the evaluation is temporary, and
show the basis for the evaluation,
such as hospitalization or
convalescence.
